title: Coronavirus: China outbreak city Wuhan raises death toll by 50%
description: The revision of Wuhan's toll comes amid growing scepticism over the transparency of China's response.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 The Chinese city of Wuhan recently lifted its strict quarantine measures
The Chinese city of Wuhan, where the coronavirus originated last year, has raised its official Covid-19 death toll by 50%, adding 1,290 fatali… [+3751 chars]
